sentences.en: A branch of our cosmic D - Dogs were fucked up by comic Zenith!
sentences.cn: 头植帮的人马居然被新江南帮打败了!

sentences.en: An unwearied pall of cloud muffled the whole expanse of sky from zenith to horizon.
sentences.cn: 一望无际的云幕蒙住了从天顶到地平线的整个夜空.

sentences.en: But he clasped both his hands over his breast, and cast his eyes towards the zenith.
sentences.cn: 但他紧握双手捂在胸前, 抬眼眺望天顶.

sentences.en: He suffered a serious car accident at the zenith of his fame.
sentences.cn: 在他名声最盛时,他碰上一宗严重的交通意外.

sentences.en: His career is now at its zenith.
sentences.cn: 他的事业现在处于鼎盛时期。

sentences.en: It felt as if we had traveled from nadir to zenith.
sentences.cn: 感觉上我们好像已从天底走到了天顶.

sentences.en: It has been 300 years since the village reached its zenith.
sentences.cn: 从曾经的辉煌岁月走到今天,已是300多年过去了.

sentences.en: It reached the zenith of its glory.
Michael feels that he has already past the zenith of his power.
sentences.cn: 麦克觉得自己的权力已过了顶盛期.

sentences.en: Michael felt that he had already passed the zenith of his power.
sentences.cn: 迈克觉得自己的权力已过了顶盛期.

sentences.en: Obama will be the zenith of black America for as long as he lives.
sentences.cn: 奥巴马毕其一生都将成为美国黑人运动成就的顶点。

sentences.en: Opera reached its zenith at the turn of the century.
sentences.cn: 歌剧在本世纪初达到了它的顶峰.

sentences.en: Our spirits rose to their zenith after the victory.
sentences.cn: 胜利之后我们的士气高昂到极点.

sentences.en: Shanghai has not yet reached the zenith of her prosperity.
sentences.cn: 上海尚未达到繁荣的顶点.

sentences.en: The zenith of Perugia'sinfluence came with the defeat of Siena in 1358.
sentences.cn: 1358年击败锡耶纳之后佩鲁贾的影响力达到了顶峰。

sentences.en: We call zenith that point in the sky directly overhead.
sentences.cn: 我们呼吁的最高境界这一点在天空直接开销.

trans.tran_en: the most successful point in the development of something
